verses.verse: And it came to pass on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117>, that Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121>, and the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>;

and he said<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Take<WH3947> thee a<WH1241> calf<WH5695> of the herd for a sin-offering<WH2403>, and a ram<WH352> for a burnt-offering<WH5930>, without blemish<WH8549>, and offer<WH7126> them before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> thou shalt speak<WH1696>, saying<WH559>, Take<WH3947> ye a<WH8163> he-goat<WH5795> for a sin-offering<WH2403>; and a calf<WH5695> and a lamb<WH3532>, both a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old<WH8549>, without blemish, for a burnt-offering<WH5930>;

and an ox<WH7794> and a ram<WH352> for peace-offerings<WH2076>, to sacrifice<WH2076> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; and a meal-offering<WH4503> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>: for to-day<WH3117> Jehovah<WH3068> appeareth unto you<WH7200>.

And they brought<WH3947> that which Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> before<WH6440> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>: and all the congregation<WH4150> drew near<WH7126> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559>, This is the thing<WH1697> which Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> that ye should do<WH6213>: and the glory<WH3519> of Jehovah<WH3068> shall appear unto you<WH7200>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Draw<WH7126> near unto the altar<WH4196>, and offer<WH6213> thy sin-offering<WH2403>, and thy burnt-offering<WH2403>, and make atonement<WH3722> for thyself<WH5971>, and for the people; and offer<WH6213> the oblation<WH7133> of the people<WH5971>, and make atonement<WH3722> for them<WH3068>; as Jehovah commanded<WH6680>.
So Aaron<WH175> drew near unto the altar<WH4196>, and slew<WH7819> the calf<WH5695> of the sin-offering<WH2403>, which was for himself.

And the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> presented<WH7126> the blood<WH1818> unto him<WH2881>; and he dipped his finger<WH676> in the blood<WH1818>, and put<WH5414> it upon the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196>, and poured<WH3332> out the blood<WH1818> at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196>:

but the fat<WH2459>, and the kidneys<WH3629>, and the caul<WH3508> from<WH4480> the liver<WH3516> of the sin-offering<WH2403>, he burnt<WH6999> upon the altar<WH4196>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And the flesh<WH1320> and the skin<WH5785> he burnt<WH8313> with fire<WH784> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>.
And he slew<WH7819> the burnt-offering<WH5930>; and Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> delivered<WH4672> unto him the blood<WH1818>, and he sprinkled<WH2236> it upon the altar<WH4196> round about<WH5439>.
And they delivered<WH4672> the burnt-offering<WH5930> unto him<WH5409>, piece by piece, and the head<WH7218>: and he burnt<WH6999> them upon the altar<WH4196>.
And he washed<WH7364> the inwards<WH7130> and the legs<WH3767>, and burnt<WH6999> them upon the burnt-offering<WH5930> on the altar<WH4196>.

And he presented<WH7126> the people<WH5971>'s oblation<WH7133>, and took<WH3947> the goat<WH8163> of the sin-offering<WH2403> which was for the people<WH5971>, and slew<WH7819> it<WH2398>, and offered it for sin, as the first<WH7223>.
And he presented<WH7126> the burnt-offering<WH5930>, and offered<WH6213> it according to the ordinance<WH4941>.

And he presented<WH7126> the meal-offering<WH4503>, and filled<WH4390> his hand<WH3709> therefrom<WH6999>, and burnt it upon the altar<WH4196>, besides<WH905> the burnt-offering<WH5930> of the morning<WH1242>.

He slew<WH7819> also the ox<WH7794> and the ram<WH352>, the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace-offerings<WH2077>, which was for the people<WH5971>: and Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> delivered<WH4672> unto him the blood<WH1818>, which he sprinkled<WH2236> upon the altar<WH4196> round about<WH5439>,
and the fat<WH2459> of the ox<WH7794> and of the ram<WH352>, the fat tail<WH451>, and that which covereth<WH4374> the inwards<WH3629>, and the kidneys, and the caul<WH3508> of the liver<WH3516>:
and they put<WH7760> the fat<WH2459> upon the breasts<WH2373>, and he burnt<WH6999> the fat<WH2459> upon the altar<WH4196>:
and the breasts<WH2373> and the right<WH3225> thigh<WH7785> Aaron<WH175> waved<WH5130> for a wave-offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; as Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680>.

And Aaron<WH175> lifted up<WH5375> his hands<WH3027> toward the people<WH5971>, and blessed<WH1288> them<WH3381>; and he came down from offering<WH6213> the sin-offering<WH6213>, and the burnt-offering<WH6213>, and the peace-offerings<WH2403>.

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went<WH935> into the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, and came out<WH3318>, and blessed<WH1288> the people<WH5971>: and the glory<WH3519> of Jehovah<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> unto all the people<WH5971>.

And there came<WH3318> forth fire<WH784> from before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, and consumed<WH398> upon the altar<WH4196> the burnt-offering<WH5930> and the fat<WH2459>: and when all the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> it<WH7442>, they shouted, and fell<WH5307> on their faces<WH6440>.
